Your mannequin's pose will be changed to <hex:022819FF14>HousingMerchantPose<hex:E8020203>. Proceed?
I have come, <hex:020815E905FF09>Mistress<hex:FF07>Master<hex:03>.
Nothin' fer ye to worry about.
You summoned?
Yes? <sigh> I hope this doesn't take long...
You wish to see how a master handles a bazaar?
Hello, hello! You called?
At your service, my <hex:02080FE905FF05>lady<hex:FF05>lord<hex:03>.
What's it to be this time, love?
What would you ask?
I'm so sorry to keep you waiting, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>. So very, very sorry.
Quickly now, I've places to be.
Well, if it ain't my favorite client! Always a pleasure, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>!
Yes, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>? What is your bidding?
What's on the agenda, chief? Deprivin' saps o' their hard-earned gil?
I have come. You may proceed.
Oh, hello there. To what do I owe the pleasure?
I am come to conduct business, and only business.

You look to be in good health, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>. How may I assist you this fine <hex:02082EE3E90C0DFF14><hex:020810E3E90C05FF04>eve<hex:FF05>morn<hex:03><hex:FF13><hex:02080FE3E90C12FF04>day<hex:FF04>eve<hex:03><hex:03>?
What is it you would have me do, <hex:020813E905FF07>milady<hex:FF07>milord<hex:03>?
Usually, it's me doin' the summons and others doin' the waitin'.
Is there something that I can help you with?
Oh, why must you summon me at a time like this...?
I'm sure there is a perfectly good explanation for this summons.
You know, I thought you might be along to summon me. You may rest assured that I am ready and eager to serve.
Hail to thee, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>. Your humble servant has heard your summons.
Greetin's and salutations, <hex:020813E905FF07>milady<hex:FF07>milord<hex:03>. Pray speak yer desires, an' I'll do me damndest to see 'em done.
I was wondering when you'd get around to calling me.
Mind if we keep this brief? I've got a pretty little thing that's waitin' for me.
What?
I'm here, I'm here!
Here I am, <hex:020815E905FF09>Mistress<hex:FF07>Master<hex:03>, as per your request.
'Ello, dearie. What's on the docket?
I never miss a chance to line these pockets.
Well, this is unexpected! What'll it be?
What is it now?
Here I aaaaaam!
How may I be of serrrvice, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>?
It's a war out there, <hex:02080EE905FF05>miss<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>. You have no idea.
Business or pleasure?
I presume you did not summon me solely for the pleasure of my company.
Just the <hex:020821E905FF0C>fair maiden<hex:FF10>handsome fellow<hex:03> I was hoping to see! Tell me your heart's desire.
I hope your catcall is not one of disapproval.
Ye rang, <hex:020813E905FF07>milady<hex:FF07>milord<hex:03>?
A cat's ears do not miss much―least of all a summons.
Curiosity called the cat. What do you have for me today?
Ready when you are.
I was just thinking of you!
What need have you of me today, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>?
Bwahahaha! Ye got work needs gettin' done? Just point me in the right bloody direction.
I've come. What is it?
Hey there─hic─<hex:020810E905FF06>missy<hex:FF05>mate<hex:03>! Care to join me fer a pint?
Couldn't come no quicker. Where's the work?
I came runnin' soon as I heard the bell! Ye need somethin', chief?
I am at your disposal, <hex:020813E905FF07>milady<hex:FF07>milord<hex:03>.
Ye got somethin' fer me, cap'n?
Go ahead, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>.
Let's keep this short and sweet, shall we?
This wouldn't be necessary if you entrusted your financial affairs to me.
So─sellin', buyin', drinkin', whorin'? What's it to be today?
Greetings, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>. How may I be of service?
What'll it be, <hex:02080FE905FF05>miss<hex:FF05>mate<hex:03>?
State your business.
And how does this wonderful <hex:020835E3E90C0DFF17><hex:020813E3E90C05FF08>evening<hex:FF04>day<hex:03><hex:FF17><hex:020813E3E90C12FF04>day<hex:FF08>evening<hex:03><hex:03> find you?
Well... Here I am...<hex:020815E905FF09>Mistress<hex:FF07>Master<hex:03>.
We work the market stalls,♪<hex:02100103>And our uniforms are pretty;♪<hex:02100103>We are sober men and true,♪<hex:02100103>And attentive to our duties!♪
<hex:020815E905FF08>My lady<hex:FF08>My lord<hex:03>. What would you ask of me?
So. We doing this?
Yes?
Hey, it's...it's you! Hello again, you!
I-It's not like I want to sell your items or anything.
What do you have for me? Come on, come on! Don't be shy!
You rang, <hex:020813E905FF07>milady<hex:FF07>milord<hex:03>?
I trust this will be worth my while.
Whatever you need, leave it to me! I have my methods.
Gahaha! If it isn't my favorite <hex:020815E905FF09>mistress<hex:FF07>master<hex:03>!
It is I, your most loyal and capable retainer!
What will it be, love?
Your orders! I would hear them at once!
If there is something you would ask of me, then ask it.
Yes...? Is there something you─<yawn>─need?
A task for me? I hope it's something fun!
I am here to do your every bidding, <hex:020815E905FF09>Mistress<hex:FF07>Master<hex:03>! Ask of me anything at all!

I have been awaiting your summons, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>. What would you have of me this fine <hex:020839E3E90C0DFF1B><hex:020817E3E90C05FF08>evening<hex:FF08>morning<hex:03><hex:FF17><hex:020813E3E90C12FF04>day<hex:FF08>evening<hex:03><hex:03>?
What can I do for ye, yer <hex:020817E905FF09>ladyship<hex:FF09>lordship<hex:03>?
You called, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>...?
You─hic─rang?
Need my assistance, do you? Let's make this quick, then.
You have my ear, <hex:020813E905FF07>milady<hex:FF07>milord<hex:03>. Both of them, in fact!
You summoned me, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>?
At your beck an' call, I am!
You called, and I have come.
At last─I thought you'd <hex:021A020203>never<hex:021A020103> call. What does <hex:020813E905FF07>milady<hex:FF07>milord<hex:03> need of me?
Could it be...? The famous <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203> has called on <hex:021A020203>me<hex:021A020103>? <chuckle>
Yes, yes, here I am! Ready at a moment's notice!
If that is all, I will take my leave now, <hex:020815E905FF09>Mistress<hex:FF07>Master<hex:03>.
Take care o' yerself, hear?
Until we next meet.
Well, it's about time. Good-bye.
I believe thanks are in order.
I'm off, then!
With your leave, my <hex:02080FE905FF05>lady<hex:FF05>lord<hex:03>.
Don't you worry 'bout a thing. I got this.
Farewell, then.
If there is nothing else, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>, I'll be going now.
Is that all? Very well, until next time.
Oh, will that be all today? Very well, but promise me you'll come back soon!
As always, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>, it has been an honor and a privilege.
You can count on me, chief─I know how to get things done.
Don't be a stranger.
I swear it shall be done. Eventually.
As you wish.
Capital! I shall carry out your orders forthwith.
I humbly await your next summons, <hex:020813E905FF07>milady<hex:FF07>milord<hex:03>.
Don't leave me alone for too long, hear?
Always a pleasure.
That will be all, yes? Then if you would excuse me...
I believe that concludes our dealings for now.
Are you certain you don't desire anything else? Anything at all? Very well, I shall take my leave.
Your every whim shall be swiftly carried out with due care and consideration.
Shouldn't take more than a moment, <hex:020813E905FF07>milady<hex:FF07>milord<hex:03>.
I'll be going, then.
Thank the gods we're finished. I've got plans to put my hands in places I've never seen...if you know what I mean.
Be well.
I'm off, I'm off!
Until we meet again!
Blessin's o' the Twelve upon ye.
May Nald'thal see fit to fatten our pockets!
Very good, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>! Your wish is my command, and so forth.
You know how to reach me.
Is it time for good-byes already? I'm going to miss you...
Thy will be done.
The markets may be a bleedin' battlefield, but I'm a godsdamned soldier. You can count on me, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>.
Why so serrrious? <sigh> So it goes.
I hardly think that warranted my personal appearance, but what is done is done.
Then I have satisfied your every need? Excellent! I do so take pleasure in servicing my clients.
Good-bye for now, <hex:020811E905FF06>madam<hex:FF06>sirrr<hex:03>.
Right then, let's get on with it!
There is no call for concerrrn.
When the master's away, the cat will play.
Gods, this is tirin'...
You don't want to be with me anymore? <sniffle>
I shall carry out your wishes as instructed, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>.
Bwahahaha! I'm in yer bazaar, sellin' yer wares!
I will go now.
Awww, bugger. Reckon I best get to work...
I don't do good-byes.
Go and grab yourself some shut-eye, chief. You look terrible!
Will that be all for today, <hex:020813E905FF07>milady<hex:FF07>milord<hex:03>? Understood.
Aye, aye, cap'n!
Duly noted.
Not exactly how I was hopin' to spend my day, but I suppose it can't be helped.
Ours is not to reason why. Ours is but to do and die.
Ever the consummate professional, I see. Another time, then.
If there is nothing else, then I shall take my leave.
Is that all? Guess I'll be on my way, then.
Any last requests? Very well. Heh heh heh... Ahem.
Ah, yes, of course. Duty calls!
You are finished with me, then?
Here today and gone tomorrow;♪<hex:02100103>Yes, I know─♪<hex:02100103>That is so!♪
If ever you have need of me, just ring.
Always a pleasure, <hex:020815E905FF09>Mistress<hex:FF07>Master<hex:03>.
Right, then.
Finished already? Guess that's that, then.
You're leaving already? Fine, then! I-It's not like I wanted you to stay or anything.
Very good, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>! Very good indeed!
Always a pleasure to serve, <hex:020813E905FF07>milady<hex:FF07>milord<hex:03>.
Hmph. I hope that next time you will have a more meaningful task for me.
And with that, I shall be off. Places to go, people to see.
Bahahaha! Till next time, my friend!
Ring for me whenever you please! You know that I will never let you down!
Must we part so soon?
And I am off!
Call on me as you please. If I am so inclined, I will answer.
That is all, I suppose...? <yawn> Very well...
That is all? Oh, I was hoping there'd be more...
Is that all you need of me? But I could yet serve you in so many ways!
Do not hesitate to call upon me again. Fare you well in your endeavors, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>.
Just say the word, yer <hex:020817E905FF09>ladyship<hex:FF09>lordship<hex:03>, and I'll be here with bells on.
If you have no further need of my services...
I'm off for another glass, then. You know where to find me!
What─is that it? Are you <hex:021A020203>sure<hex:021A020103> you need a retainer?
Nothing else? Then I shall be hopping along.
I'm glad to have been of service. Mind you don't overdo things, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>.
Had your fill of me, eh? Fair enough! Let me know if you need aught else!
We're done? Then I take my leave.
There's naught else <hex:020813E905FF07>milady<hex:FF07>milord<hex:03> requires? I'll be sharpening my claws, then, waiting for your next summons.
Nothing else? Right... I'll be off!
Have everything you need? I'll take a little nap, then.
